entry.data:
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 70
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
LOWS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS AROUND 90

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
